title: Gowdy to Clinton: 'You are one important witness'
text: Gowdy to Clinton: 'You are one important witness' Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - Chairman of the House Select Committee on Benghazi Trey Gowdy seemed to seek to downplay former secretary of state Hillary Clinton's importance to the committee's investigation during his opening remarks at a hearing Oct. 22.
